lentil_salad: Lentil Salad with Spinach and Carrots
lentil_salad_description: This salad is a healthy and protein-packed option. Lentils are mixed with fresh spinach, grated carrots, and a light dressing, offering a nutritious, flavorful, and textured dish.
potato_salad_description: A classic and comforting dish, potato salad combines boiled potatoes with mayonnaise, onion, hard-boiled eggs, and a touch of mustard, creating a creamy and delicious mixture. Ideal as a side dish or a light main course.
grilled_tuna: Grilled Tuna with Avocado Pesto and Vegetables
grilled_tuna_description: A light and flavorful dish, grilled tuna is served with creamy avocado pesto, accompanied by sautéed vegetables. It's a perfect combination of lean protein, healthy fats, and fresh vegetables.
